question.questionText: Here are the rubbings of leaves from 2 different plants. They look similar but are not the same. [Put numbers in the 2 ovals to group the rubbings by plant into Group one and Group 2.] Describe how the rubbings show that the leaves from the 2 plants are different.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: In Group one, the veins of the leaves do not meet at the center vein. In Group 2, each pair of veins comes together at the center vein.
